Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.event

Interface DocumentListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BulkAwareDocumentListener, BulkAwareDocumentListener.Simple, EditorEventListener, EditorHighlighter, PrioritizedDocumentListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CaretModelImpl, ChangeSignatureDialogBase.UpdateSignatureListener, ComboboxEditorTextField, DocumentAdapter, DocumentUndoProvider, EditorComboBox, EditorMarkupModelImpl, EditorTextField, EmptyEditorHighlighter, FoldingModelImpl, FragmentedEditorHighlighter, GrMethodSignatureComponent, GroovyEditorHighlighter, InlayModelImpl, InplaceChangeSignature, JBTableRowEditor.RowEditorChangeListener, LanguageTextField, LayeredLexerEditorHighlighter, LexerEditorHighlighter, LightEditPositionWidget, LivePreview, LookupOffsets, MethodSignatureComponent, PositionPanel, PsiDocumentManagerBase, PsiDocumentManagerBase.PriorityEventCollector, PsiDocumentManagerImpl, PushTargetTextField, PyConsoleStartFolding, PythonEditorHighlighter, QuickEditHandler, RangeMarkerSpy, RestEditorHighlighter, SearchResults, SoftWrapModelImpl, StructuralSearchDialog, SubstitutionShortInfoHandler, TextFieldWithAutoCompletion, TextFieldWithCompletion, TextViewer

    public interface DocumentListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Allows to receive notifications about changes in edited documents. Implementations shouldn't modify the document, for which event is emitted, in listener methods.

    Implement BulkAwareDocumentListener.Simple instead of this interface whenever possible to improve performance.

    See Also:
    Document.addDocumentListener(DocumentListener), Document.addDocumentListener(DocumentListener, Disposable), EditorEventMulticaster.addDocumentListener(DocumentListener, Disposable)
